content: Haba ioh ban ia kren bad I Bah Elegis Thongni, I Bah Nick Shangpliang kiba dei ki nongshna ia kane ka film LYNGKAR  kila ong hadien ba la dep ban ioh ia ka certificate napoh Ka Central Board of Film Certification Guwahati ki la ong ba mynta kane ka Film ka dang ap line hapoh cinema hall shillong, ki la ong ruh ba ia kane ka Film la ak da i Abalin Nongkhlaw, Wellborn Mynsong, John Rani,Sanmilian  Mawrie, Arman Disiar, Anthony Khyriem, Mewan Pohthmi bad i Kyrmen K Ryja kiba ju mih bha hapoh ka YouTube.Kaba kham sngewtynnad ka long ba ka jingdon bynta jong i Bah Alfontbirth Kharsyntiew iba dei i Secretary jong ka Seng Nongrep (HFU) Meghalaya, kala pynlong ia ki nongrep napoh Swer kaba don ha thain Mawjrong lynti Sohra ba ki la thrang dik dik ban iohi noh ia katei ka film Lyngkar, Haba ioh ban ia kren bad kitei ki nongrep ki la ong ruh ba ka jingmih shakhmat jong i Secretary ka Seng ki nongrep ka pynlong ia ki ba kin ioh mynsiem ban hikai ia ki khun ki kti ba kim dei ban sahkut tang ha ka am rep hynrei ki dei ban trei shitom ban mih shakhmat ban trei beit ha kino kino ki jaitkam, la ki don sap ban rwai ban shad ban ak ban lehkai sport bad kiwei kiwei de. Ki tei ki nongrep ki la ong ruh ba ki la thrang dik dik ban iohi noh ia katei ka Film bad ki la ong ruh ba ynda la mih katei a Film Lyngkar hapoh Cinema kin sa ia pynmih bai kali ban ioh leit lang da ka Bus bad yn tang shu iohi ia u Secretary shar ngin ia risa. Ki la ong ruh ba ha ka sngi ba nyngkong mar ia bna ban pyni kin ia leit peit ia katei ka film.
title: Thrang dik dik ki nongrep ban iohi noh ia ka Film Lyngkar ba la ak da i Aba, Sanmilian, John bad Welborn

content: Haba iaid sharum shaneng lane haba ngi peit ha ki social media ka don beit kata ka jingiania para khasi tang shu dei ka samoi jied ia ki nongthaw ain la kadei ha ka MDC / MLA / MP.  Ka jingmih jong ka party VPP ka dei kaba pynshongshit ia ki nongkyrshan Election bad i ruh kumba ki nongkyrshan ki la ia khleh biej lut baroh, La ka dei ha ki music video hapoh YouTube  ki comment beit ” Ha u Prah ” lada dei ha ki video jingiaseng ne ialap ruh ki comment beit ” Ha u Prah “. kine ki briew kim tip shuh ia ka content la ka dei ne em ka content politics kane ka jingkren ne comment khleh biej ka pynpaw ia ka jingshongshit bad jingbiej. Kaba thamula ka long ba phin tang shu kren ne ong pyrshah hangta lei ki nongkyrshan i kumban shoh ban shoh ? Hato kane ka jingleh jong ki nongkyrshan ka dei kaba ieit jaidbynriew ? Ka jingieid jait bynriew ka dei kaba ngi ia ieit ia burom iwei ia wei, ngi ia ai jingmut iwei ia iwei lane ngi leh kaei kaei kab tei ia ka imlang ka sahlang.Ha ka samoi jied ia ki nongthaw ain bun kiba ieit jaidbynriew la kadei ia ki kyrtong ne ia ki nongialam ba ha khmat jong ka party la kadei na ka VPP / NPP/ UDP  bad kiwei kiwei de ki party. Ki kren ieit jaidbynriew haduh ba ki paidbah khamtam kiba duna ha ka jingnang jingstad ki lah kulmar namar da sngap ba kren uwei ruh ka dei, da kren sa uwei ruh kaba dei, da kren biang da na kawei ka party ruh ka dei hi. Kane ka buh jingeh bad shah ialam bakla khamtam ia kito kiba duna ha ka jingnang jingstad bad ha kaba khatduh ki paidbah ki ngop ha kito ki ba bang ktien bad kane ka wanrah ruh ia ka jingeh ia ki paidbah.Ki kyrtong bad ki nongialam ba ha khmat jong kano kano ka party kim salia ban kren ne kynthoh iano iano tang na ka bynta ban myntoi ia lade shimet hynrei haba phai pat sha ki paidbah jong ka jylla ngi dang mad shibun ia ka jingeh la ka dei ha ka pule puthi, ha ka liang ka ioh ka kot bad kiwei kiwei de.Ki kyrtong bad ki nongkyrshan ki ong ba ka dei ka jingkren jong nga, sa uwei na kawei ka party u ong kajuh hi ka kyntien.  Ha kum kane ka por bun ruh kiba ia sniew ne ia paid ia pra tang na kadaw ka election. Te kum ki paidbah to long kiba stad ym ban shu ia shongshit khleh biej hynrei to long kiba sngewthuh bad pyrkhat sani bha shwa ban leh ne kren iano iano.
title: Khleh biej ki paidbah shisien haka 5 snem khamtam lada ym iashah ia ka VPP

content: Ka thma hapdeng ka Israel bad ki Lehnoh Hamas ka la pynlong ia bun ngut ki briew kiba phetwir. Katkum ki tyllong khubor na katei ka ri la iathuh ki Lehnoh Hamas ki la pyniap ba palat 700 ngut bad kitnap palat 100 ngut ki briew na Israel. Kaba kham ima bad shyrkhei bha ka long ba ki lehnoh Hamas ki la kitnap ia kawei ka khynthei, ki la law lyngkhuid teh ruh da u ksai na ryndang bad kit hapoh ka Pickup truck. Kitei ki lehnoh Hamas ki la kam ba katei ka kynthei ka dei ka shipai Israel hynrei katkum ka khubor napoh ka news.com.au ia katei ka kynthei ba la shah kipnap la pyntikna da ka Shani Louk hapoh ka twitter lyngba u tatoo ba kadei ka para jong ka kaba na Germany. Ka kmie jong ka Shani Louk kaba la ai jingkren hapoh ka video ha twitter account ba la post da i Visegrad ka la pyntikna ba kadei ka khun jong ka. Katei ka kmie ka la pynjingiarap ruh na kitei ki nongshong shnong jong ka Israel.
title: Viral video ba Law lyngkhuid bad na ryndang teh ki Lehnoh Hamas iaka kynthei na Germany

content: Ha ka 24.06.2023 ka Khasi Disabilities Association ka la pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah ban jied thymmai ia ki nongkitkam nabynta ka samoi 2023-2028  ha kaba u Bah Shanlang Wahlang, Organising Secretary, Khasi Disabilities Association, Central Body u la iadon bynta lang ha katei ka sngi ban pynskhem ia ki nongkitkam kiba ka seng ka lajied thymmai U Michael Thongni, President U Johny Syiem, Vice President, U Mesaia L.Iawlar, General Secretary, Honestson Asst. Secretary, Genevie Thabah, Finance Secretary, Spleindaris Jyrwa, Asst. Finance Secretary, Luckystar Nongdkhar, Publicity Secretary bad ki wei de.Ha katei ka sngi u Bah Shanlang Wahlang haba ai jingkren u la kyntu ia ki dkhot baroh ba ki dei ban trei shitrhem ban shakri ia ki briew kiba don ka jingduna ha ki dkhotmet bad ia ka imlang sahlang. U la ong haba phai sha kaliang ka mon ka diang ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet ki shah ban beiñ ia ki hok jong ki ha ka sorkar. Wat la ki lomg kibriew ba duna hynrei la nion beiñ ia ki, ka bhah thung kam thung jam ka wei na ki mat kaba lah ban ai ja ai jingbam ia ngi ki ba tlot bor ban ia im ryngkat bad ki wei kiba biang la knieh jyndat bad ym shym la thung wat la kadon ka bhah kyrpang kaba la buh da ka sorkar kmie ha RPWD Act 2016, shuh shuh u la bynrap ba na ka liang jong ka seng kin sa ther tymgeh ia ka sorkar lada jia ba nangne sha khmat ki bhah ba la mang kyrpang kim trei kam.
title: Jied nongkitkam thymmai Ka seng kiba duna dkhot met na bynta ka samoi 2023-2028

content: Katkum ba la post da u Chief Minister barim ka Meghalaya u Dr. Mukul Sangma hapoh ka facebook page ka jong u, la iohi ba ka thei ka thei nuti ka phun ia u bad ka thmu ban pynbiej khnang ban ioh pisa hynrei katei ka khlem urlong, Te u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba ki dei ban kiar na kine ki briew kiba thmu ban pynlehrain bad thaw lad tang ban ioh pisa.Phi lah ban check ia ki post lyngba kane ka Link
title: Leh video Call ka Thei Nuti ia u Dr.Mukul Sangma

content: U Bah Disparsing Rani uba dei uwei na ki nongwad RTI jong ka Jylla Meghalaya u la post hapoh ka Facebook Acoount ka jong u da kaba ong kumne ia ka DTO Shillong ” Khamkor ka tuh-por ban iaka tuh-pisa. Timing ha DTO counter. Por plie-10 am to 1.pm. Mynta 30 tarik dei last day of the month.  10 am. to 11.30. hynrei dang plie pat 10.50 am.Facebook Link :-
title: Khamkor ka tuh-por ban iaka tuh-pisa ha DTO ong u Bah Disparsing Rani

content: Ka karkhana fitness baroh kawei ka la ioh khubor sngewsih ba u Jo Linder ia kaba ki briew ki ithuh bha ia u, kum u nongleh gym ba paw bha hapoh social media uba 8.7 Millions ngut ki nong follow u la khlad noh kyndit kyndit na kane ka sla pyrthei ha ka rta kaba dang 30 snem kadei na ka jingpang aneurysm. La pynbna ia kane ka khubor da ka samla jong u ka Nicha hapoh Instagram . Ha ka Instagram ka la thoh “mynnin ba u la khlad noh na ka jingpang aneurysm, nga la don lang bad u ha kamra, bad u la pyndeng ia nga ia u necklace ba u la pynshna kyrpang na ka bynta jong nga, hadien kata ngi la ia dem noh ha jingthiah, bad ynda ngi la dep ialeh ieid kumne kumtai. bad ngi dang ap ruh ia ka por ban leit kynduh ia u Noel sha gym ha ka por 4.00 janmiet. Hynrei hakato ka por ba u don hapoh ka shadem jong nga por badag ia leh ieit kumne kumtai, la jia ryngkat pynban noh kumne, bad kane kadei ka jingjia kaba kloi palat, ha ki lai sngi ba la dep u la iathuh ba u pang ryndang, hynrei ngi khlem pynleit jingmut bad ngim poi pyrkhat ba kan jia kumne. La ong katei ka samla jong u.
title: Katba dang ia leh ieit kumne kumtai ha jingthiah khlad noh u nongialeh kai gym pa pawnam tam ha Social media

content: Hadien ba la mih ka Panel Discussion halor ka Reservation Policy i Dr. Batskhem Marboh iba dei i Spokeperson ka Voice of the People Party ( VPP ) i la thoh ia kane ka jingthoh hapoh ka Facebook account ka jong i da kaba ong kumne ” Ka jingiakren ba wan dier por ha ka Wei ka Liang bad kloi palat h aka wei pat ka Liang. Ka dier por namar ba ia ka jingkylli hato donkam ne em ban khmih biang ia ka reservation polisi la jubab bad ka sorkar ruh ka la mynjur ia kata. Bad kumno yn khmih biang ia ka, ka expert committee kam pat shong pat khmih bad ai ia ka rai. Te ban ia kren ruh kam da don jingmut. ”Facebook Link :Ki nongiashim bynta hapoh katei ka Panel Discussion hapor ka Reservation Policy kin long kumne harum :1. Shri. Paul Lyngdoh ( Minister Govt. of Meghalaya )2. Shri. Saleng Sangma ( MLA Gambegre Constituency )3. Dr. Batskhem Marboh ( Spoke person ka VPP )4.  Shri. Napoleon Hajong ( President All India Hajong Community )5. Dr. Bhogtoram Mawroh ( Public Intellectual )6. Shri. Robert Kharjahrin ( President HYC )Rev. Kyrsoibor Pyrtuh ( Moderator )9th June, 2023  ka por kan long 6 baje janmiet ha Conference Hall, SSA Stadium , 1st Ground Polo.
title: ka Panel Discussion halor ka Reservation Policy Kadei jingiakren ba wan dier por bad kloi palat haka wei pat ka Liang ( VPP Spoke Person Dr. Batskhem Marboh )

content: Ha dien ba ngi la dep ringdur ia kawei naka dur im ka ba kyrteng “ EHRANG” bad la Ioh iaka syrnod naka Central Board Film Certificate na Guwahati,ngi naka liang kaRyngkat kangi la thmu ban pyllait paitbah noh hakaha Biju Cinema Hall Shillong Ka por kan long hakaKhyndiat haba ngi phai sha kane ka film  thymmai  kaba ngi thmu ban pyllait paitbah noh, iakane ka film la Direct da U Bahbad la ringdur dabad la Bei tyngka da uIakane ka film la lamkhmat  da u Shongdor Thabah ,U Actor bala ak  lam khmat haki  Filmbad kiwei kiwei  de.Actress pat la ak da IIba La ak ruh ha ki filmbad kiwei kiwei.Bad kiwei kiwei ruh ki Actor Comedian kiba paw ka Jylla  kiba la shim bynta hakane ka Filmki long  –.Bad kiwei kiwei ki Actor kiba La ak ha ki Film Bapher bapher kum-Na ka liang ka team jong ka film EHRANG ngi Khot ngi wer ia phi ki paitbah nongkyrshan ba phin wan ban ai jing kyrshan lang ia ngi sa shisien ha Biju Cinema Hall Shillong Na ka bynta kane ka film thymmai. Ka Jing iai kyrshan lang ka jong phi ki paitbah  ba ngin nang iai kiew shaphrang hakane ka liang.Shi hajar nguh ia phi Baroh…
title: Mynta dang jynjar ban wad ia u Dieng suh bniat ban ia kaba wad lok ( Film EHRANG )

content: Ka Kynhun temkaba lah seng da ki Lai ngut ki shi paralok Ka dei kawei na ka Kynhun tem ban pynkhie im biang ia ki jigrwai barim kum ki Rock music. Kadei ruh kawei naka Kynhun tem kaba kyntiew ia ki Rock Music ha shillong, kane ka Kynhun tem ka lah tem kylleng kylleng ka nongbah shillong bad ha ka nongbahkum ha ka. Kane ka kynhun tem ka don ruh ka jingthmu ban pynmih ia ka jingrwai na lade ha kine hi ki snem.Lada phi donkam ban tem ha kino kino ki Function phi lah ban contact ia ngi lyngba une u number : 6009602826. Email Id : mebankharkongor121@gmail.com
title: Ka kynhun tem NEVER END kaba la tem ha kylleng ka Nongbah Shillong bad Guwahati

content: Kumba ngi lah iohi ha katei ka dur kaba la saphriang sted bha mynta hapoh social media, ba u Bahuba dei u nongkyrshan ba rat bah jong ka senguba la kren shibun kiei kiei kiba pynlong ia ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya ba kin ithuh bha ia u lyngba ka Election ba dang shu dep shen hapohu la iohlad ban ia shon dur lang bad uuba dei u President jong ka Seng. Katei ka dur kaba ki ia shonlang ka dei hapoh ka Shnongkaba la upload hapoh ka Facebook page jong ka.
title: Ong ki paidbah ia u Amazing ban ieng MDC naka VPP lyngba kadur ba shonlang bad i Bah Ardent

content: Ka Sur u paitbah jong ka South West Khasi Hills District la shai ka sngi jong ka 25 tarik jymmang 2023 kan pynlong iaka peace rally ka ban sdang naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep yn pynkut haka por 1 baje kum shi bynta ban ai jingkyrshan iaka jingshah thngan jong president rangbah jong ka VPP ryngkat ka kynhun jong u.Kumta ka sur u paitbah ka khot wer iaki paitbah jong ka swkhd khamtam iaki samla ba kin wan ban ai jingkyrshan lem la shai ka sngi khnang ba ka jingdawa ban pynkylla iaka reservation policy kan urlongKa jingsdang ban iaid ka peace rally kan sdang na khmat jong ka sngap syiem college bad kan kut pat ha iew mawkyrwat hadien kane kan don ruh ka jingialang haka tei ka sngi ha iew mawkyrwat.
title: Ba shah thngan u Bah Ardent Basaiawmoit yn pynlong Peace rally Ka Sur u paitbah jong ka South West Khasi Hills District

content: Ka jingkren jong u Bah Samlin Malngiang ba ong ban khang ia ki kam pynroi ha Sohiong kadei ka jingkulmar jibgmut ba lah lut bun palat ka pisa lane lah shu pyndonkam beit da ki bor pisa ban trei la ong u Bah Amazing Kurbah. U la ong shuh shuh ruh ba ha ka por ialap election ngi lah dep sngewthuh ba u kyrtong ka NPP u rieh hadien ka party ym don shuh ka atiar na lajong ban kren ia ka Nongrim u paidbah. U la ong ruh ba  donbok  ba don jong Bah Prestone Tynsong, kiwei kiwei de ki heh ka NPP kiba wan hapoh Sohiong Constituency kiba la pynlong ia ka UDP ba kan tam tang 3 hajar tam da ym dei na ki lei te lah tam palat beit ia ka 7,8 hajar votes namar na ki paidbah kim pdiang shuh. Lada u kren kulmar katno katno ruh ngi ngin nym tieng namar shisien ba lah shah rem kin nym don bor shuh da kumwei pat. U Bah Amazing u la ong shuh shuh ruh ba lada u Bah Samlin Malngiang u don shisha ka bor um dei shuh ban ia khun iaka election u dei ban rung noh tang kum u nongkitkam la ong u Bah Amazing Kurbah.
title: Bluit mih u Bah Amazing ban jubab ia u Bah Samlin ba ong pynduh kam pynroi ha Sohïong

content: Katkum ka video ba la saphriang ha ki social media ka la pyni ba ki paidbah nongkyrshan ka NPP ki dang ia thap kti hadien ba i Bahi la ong la ki don ha ka kam sorkar la ki don ha ka kam business wat tieng than kumba ma ngi ruh ngi don ha ka sorkar wat ia rit mynsiem, kin nym lah ban transfer khlem da ioh hukum lem na ngi ruh bad katne ki la pynsat ngan sa peit haduh katno ki lah ban trei bad ngan iuh bad kti bad kjat artad ban khang lyngba ka sorkar ba ym dei ban ai eiei ia ka sohiong Constituency.
title: Byrngem u Bah Samlin Malngiang hadien ba lah rem ha ka Election
